title: 报错
author: yy梁
txt_content:
服务端没有崩溃，没有崩服
就是时不时后台会冒出下面这一段报错怎么解决？
是插件吗？还是服务端核心？
[21:50:04] [KCauldron version retrievier/WARN]: Error occured during retriving version
java.lang.Throwable
        at kcauldron.KLog.log(KLog.java:30) [KLog.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        at kcauldron.KLog.warning(KLog.java:41) [KLog.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]

        at kcauldron.updater.KVersionRetriever.run(KVersionRetriever.java:69) [KVersionRetriever.class:1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) [?:1.8.0_222]
Caused by: java.net.UnknownHostException: api.prok.pw: Name or service not known
        at java.net.Inet4AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_222]

        at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1193) ~[?:1.8.0_222]
        at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1127) ~[?:1.8.0_222]
        at org.apache.http.impl.conn.SystemDefaultDnsResolver.resolve(SystemDefaultDnsResolver.java:45) ~[SystemDefaultDnsResolver.class:4.4.1]
        at org.apache.http.impl.conn.DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.connect(DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.java:111) ~[DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.class:4.4.1]
        at org.apache.http.impl.conn.PoolingHttpClientConnectionManager.connect(PoolingHttpClientConnectionManager.java:353) ~[PoolingHttpClientConnectionManager.class:4.4.1]

        at org.apache.http.impl.execchain.RedirectExec.execute(RedirectExec.java:110) ~[RedirectExec.class:4.4.1]

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
kcauldron.yml 中设置 

updatechecker:
  enable: false

replies.author: yy梁
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-4-11 22:08
kcauldron.yml 中设置 

updatechecker:
那请问，有没有更新地址？
或者怎么更新之类的？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
yy梁 发表于 2020-4-12 00:31
那请问，有没有更新地址？
或者怎么更新之类的？
检查更新的服务器大概已经关了。

也无需更新了
